latestNews.title: 2023 Best Beaches Contest Winners
latestNews.summary: Travlr Getaways wins multiple awards in the annual best beaches contest.
latestNews.content: We are thrilled to announce that our resort has won several prestigious awards in the 2023 Best Beaches Contest, including 'Most Beautiful Sunset View' and 'Best Family-Friendly Beach'.

latestNews.title: Top 10 Diving Spots
latestNews.summary: Discover the most spectacular diving locations around our resort.
latestNews.content: Our marine biologists have compiled a list of the top 10 diving spots accessible from our resort, featuring coral reefs, underwater caves, and diverse marine life.

latestNews.title: Fishing ban to be implemented this year
latestNews.summary: New conservation measures to protect marine ecosystem.
latestNews.content: In partnership with local environmental groups, a temporary fishing ban will be implemented in certain areas to allow marine life to recover and thrive.

latestNews.title: Lifeguard saves child from drowning
latestNews.summary: Quick action by our trained lifeguard prevents tragedy.
latestNews.content: Our certified lifeguard team successfully rescued a young guest, demonstrating the importance of our comprehensive water safety program.

vacationTips.title: What to bring on the beach?
vacationTips.summary: Essential items for a perfect beach day.
vacationTips.content: Sunscreen, water, hat, beach towel, and waterproof phone case are must-have items for any beach adventure.

vacationTips.title: Planning Fun Activities
vacationTips.summary: Make the most of your beach vacation.
vacationTips.content: From beach volleyball to snorkeling, plan activities that match your energy level and interests.

vacationTips.title: Diving Checklist
vacationTips.content: Always check your equipment, dive with a buddy, and follow depth limits for a safe diving experience.

vacationTips.title: First Aid
vacationTips.summary: Basic first aid knowledge for beach activities.
vacationTips.content: Know how to treat sunburn, cuts from shells, and recognize signs of heat exhaustion.

vacationTips.title: How to Build a Sand Castle?
vacationTips.summary: Tips for creating amazing sand sculptures.
vacationTips.content: Use wet sand, bring the right tools, and start with a solid foundation for impressive sand castles.

vacationTips.title: Tanning Tips
vacationTips.summary: Safe tanning practices for healthy skin.
vacationTips.content: Use SPF protection, limit exposure time, and stay hydrated for a safe and healthy tan.
